info.title: Canvas Data API
info.description: API for fetching Canvas LMS data (assignments, events, grades, messages, courses, announcements, and discussions) via a Google Apps Script endpoint.

get.summary: Retrieve Canvas data based on action

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform. Valid values: events, assignments, grades, messages, courses, announcements, discussions.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default is 5).
